about_the_game:
Exploration

Explore atmospheric, detailed locations and enjoy realistic graphics with a carefully crafted environment. Overcome obstacles, climb over barriers, crawl through tight spaces, and scale heights—only the most determined will find their way forward.

Atmosphere

Step into the role of a beautiful and fragile young girl to immerse yourself in a gloomy atmosphere filled with mystery and fear. Experience the contrast between her calm appearance and the dark secrets lurking around every corner of this eerie place.

Puzzles

You will encounter various puzzles along your path, solving which will be the key to understanding the true nature of this place. With each secret uncovered, more terrifying details will emerge, drawing you deeper into the dark depths of this story.

Story

You open your eyes—it's a familiar ceiling, but something feels off. The silence is too deep. The place that was your home since childhood now feels empty, lifeless... almost unfamiliar.

Where is everyone? Why did they leave you behind?

To find the answers, you’ll have to move forward—through the unsettling darkness, through abandoned hallways hiding unknown dangers. But you won’t give up. Because you have a purpose. And if the world has truly fallen… then someone has to save it.

Combat

A unique close-combat system has been designed to make every encounter intense and dangerous. Even the simplest zombies are now formidable threats. With only a kitchen knife as your main weapon, combat takes place at a dangerously close distance. Experience a classic combat system where every move matters.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages. It contains General Mature Content, and may include Nudity or Sexual Content.

name: Lunar Eclipse

short_description: A captivating puzzle game set in a haunting atmosphere with a charming blonde heroine. Explore dark locations, solve mysteries, and enjoy a unique story.
